forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 63F. Winds light and variable.
